resources.string: The trial period has expired. \nTo continue using it, please upgrade to the paid unlimited version or watch the ad and extend the 24-hour trial period.
* Update the status by turning it on again
The trial period has been extended by 24 hours.
A.This app is to prevent accidental touch on the screen. Specify the touch limit range from the "Setting" tab at the top of the screen.

A.By tapping the icons displayed on the top, bottom, left, and right of the setting screen, you can edit the touch limit area about the position. "Width / Height" and "Show / Hide" can be set at each position.
Q.What is the icon displayed in the touch limit area?
A.Long press the icon to switch the back operation ON / OFF.
Q.The setting change is not reflected.
A.The current setting is reflected by switching the display to OFF and then turning it ON again.
Q.I applied the range to the entire screen and can no longer operate it.
A.You can cancel the touch restriction by pressing "Stop" from the notification bar.
Q.It does not apply to the edge of the screen.

A.On Android, the display cannot be overlaid on the system that is important for security, so it may not be displayed at the edge depending on the screen. This application is displayed at the end that can be displayed on each screen.

A.This application can be used free of charge for 7 days (168 hours) from the first startup. Subsequent startups will prompt you to upgrade to the unlimited version or extend it for free. The unlimited version can be used for an unlimited period of time.
A.Please feel free to contact us at the email address below.\n\nganbalism@gmail.com
Please check the usage from the "Help" tab at the top of the screen. \nPlease allow "Overlay on other apps" on the next screen.
